posts.post_content:
Selling an SGC 50 Chance Yellow portrait. (Sold) includes shipping. PayPal gift preferred payment.

Jerry

Nice card, bit of a WST of Frank on the back.
Beautiful card, but why do they call it "yellow", when it's clearly orange?

[quote name="GoldenAge50s" post=1245266]Beautiful card, but why do they call it "yellow", when it's clearly orange?[/QUOTE]

I've always wondered about that as well.  :confused:

The "yellow" has always looked yellow to me.  This one is orange:

[url]http://www.robertedwardauctions.com/auction/2011/296.html[/url]
Thanks Jerry. Looking forward to getting the Chance.

Card also had the double name at the top. Good pickup.

Matt
